I last saw you I have been constantly
employed in writing letters, and have
several more to write; for I do not
intend that any one shall hear
of me after I depart. I need not
conjure you to look upon me as ^one of
whom all links that once existed
between us are broken. Your ob Your
own delicacy will not permit ^allow you, I
am convinced, to attempt to trace me â€“
It is fare better for your peace
that you should be ignorant of my
destination. You will not follow me,
for my when I bannish myself
would you nourish guilt by obtru
ding yourself upon me? You will not
do this, I know you will not. You
must forget me and all the evil that
I have taught you. Cast off the
only gift that I have bestowed
upon you, your misery grief, and
